statements: DELETE FROM water_samples WHERE sample_id = 10 AND source_name = 'River A';
DELETE FROM WaterSamples WHERE sample_id = 100 AND chemical_name = 'Chlorine';
DELETE FROM PollutionSources WHERE pollution_level > 50 AND location LIKE '%River%';
DELETE FROM PollutionSources WHERE source_name = 'Factory X';
DELETE FROM ChemicalAnalysis WHERE sample_id = 3 AND chemical_name = 'Lead';
DELETE FROM WaterSamples WHERE sample_date < '2022-01-01' AND pH > 7.5;
DELETE FROM ChemicalAnalysis WHERE concentration < 0.005 AND chemical_name = 'Lead';
